# virtual-react package

React components, hooks and utils used to connect to [VirtualScroller](/virtual/reference/virtual-core.virtualscroller)

## Functions

Function


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>

Creates callback ref for grid item at specified index.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[createListItemRef(model, itemIndex)](/virtual/reference/virtual-react.createlistitemref)


</td><td>

Creates callback ref for list item at specified index.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[List(props)](/virtual/reference/virtual-react.list)


</td><td>

React component. Small abstraction, which in 90% cases allows to avoid hook boilerplate.


</td></tr>

[mapVisibleRange(model, cb)](/virtual/reference/virtual-react.mapvisiblerange)


</td><td>

Map current visible items

<tr><td>

[mapVisibleRangeWithOffset(model, cb)](/virtual/reference/virtual-react.mapvisiblerangewithoffset)

Map current visible items and provide offset for each item.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[Subscription(props)](/virtual/reference/virtual-react.subscription)


</td><td>

React component. Rerenders only on certain [VirtualScrollerEvent](/virtual/reference/virtual-core.virtualscrollerevent)<!-- -->. Allows to optimize performance.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[useComponentSubscription(model, events)](/virtual/reference/virtual-react.usecomponentsubscription)


</td><td>

React hook. Rerenders component when one of [VirtualScrollerEvent](/virtual/reference/virtual-core.virtualscrollerevent) gets emitted.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[useScroller(model, scroller)](/virtual/reference/virtual-react.usescroller)


</td><td>

React hook. Synchronizes scroller with model.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[useSubscription(model, events, callBack)](/virtual/reference/virtual-react.usesubscription)


</td><td>

React hook. Allows to subscribe to [VirtualScrollerEvent](/virtual/reference/virtual-core.virtualscrollerevent) without unnecessary rerenders.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[useSyncedStyles(model)](/virtual/reference/virtual-react.usesyncedstyles)


</td><td>

React hook. Optimal CSS markup for virtual scroll is not intuitive. Use this hook to avoid unneeded boilerplate.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[useVirtual(params)](/virtual/reference/virtual-react.usevirtual)


</td><td>

React hook. Calls [useVirtualModel()](/virtual/reference/virtual-react.usevirtualmodel) and synchronizes it with props


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[useVirtualModel(params)](/virtual/reference/virtual-react.usevirtualmodel)


</td><td>

React hook. Creates and stores one [VirtualScroller](/virtual/reference/virtual-core.virtualscroller) instance. It is not recreated during component lifecycle.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
